GP12sivap7_u:2295: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya yajñahantre triśūline // ŚivP_7.1,23. 8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2298: devatānāṃ śirohantre dakṣasya ca durātmanaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.9cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2300: śāsitāḥ samare vīra tvayā vayamaninditā // ŚivP_7.1,23.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2301: dagdhāścāmī vayaṃ sarve tvatto bhītāśca bho prabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2304: tuṣṭastvevaṃ stuto devān visṛjya nigaḍātprabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2306: devopi tatra bhagavānantarikṣe sthitaḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.13ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2308: taṃ dṛṣṭvā parameśānaṃ devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2309: prītā api ca bhītāśca namaścakrurmaheśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,23.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2311: idamāha mahādevaḥ prahasan prekṣya pārvatīm // ŚivP_7.1,23.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2313: mābhaiṣṭa tridaśāssarve yūyaṃ vai māmikāḥ prajāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2316: kruddheṣvasmāsu yuṣmākaṃ na sthitirna ca jīvitam // ŚivP_7.1,23.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2323: tvameva devākhilalokakartā pātā ca hartā parameśvaro 'si // ŚivP_7.1,23.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2327: caṃdro 'gado hi deveśa kṛpātastava śaṃkara // ŚivP_7.1,23.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2329: sīmantinī hatadhavā tava pūjanataḥ prabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2331: śrīkarāya dadau devaḥ svīyaṃ padamanuttamam // ŚivP_7.1,23.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2333: meduraṃ tārayāmāsa sadāraṃ ca ghṛṇānidhiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2334: śāradāṃ vidhavāṃ cakre sadhavāṃ kriyayā bhavān // ŚivP_7.1,23.25cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2335: bhadrāyuṣo vipattiṃ ca vicchidya tvamadāḥ sukham // ŚivP_7.1,23.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2340: kartā pātā tathā hartā janānugrahakāṃkṣayā // ŚivP_7.1,23.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2343: tvattaḥ sarvaṃ ca tvaṃ sarvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ girīśvara // ŚivP_7.1,23.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2344: trāhi trāhi punastrāhi kṛpāṃ kuru mamopari // ŚivP_7.1,23.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2346: evaṃ tvavasaraṃ prāpya vyajñāpayata śūline // ŚivP_7.1,23.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2350: labdhamāno bhaviṣyaṃti ye purā nihitā mṛdhe // ŚivP_7.1,23.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2358: prathamādyaiśca yā devyo daṃḍitā devamātaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2360: dakṣasya bhagavāneva svayaṃ brahmā pitāmahaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2362: so 'pi saṃjñāṃ tato labdhvā sa dṛṣṭvā jīvitaḥ sudhī // ŚivP_7.1,23.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2363: bhītaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ śaṃbhuṃ tuṣṭāva pralapanbahu // ŚivP_7.1,23.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2366: kṛpāṃ kuru maheśānāparādhaṃ me kṣamasva ha // ŚivP_7.1,23.39cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2367: kartā bhartā ca hartā ca tvameva jagatāṃ prabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2369: tvayaiva vitataṃ sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ na nāśitam // ŚivP_7.1,23.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2372: taṃ tathā vyākulaṃ bhītaṃ pralapaṃtaṃ kṛtāgasam // ŚivP_7.1,23.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2376: tato brahmādayo devā abhivaṃdya kṛta 2aṃjaliḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.44ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2377: tuṣṭuvuḥ praśrayā vācā śaṃkaraṃ girijādhipam // ŚivP_7.1,23.44cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2379: jaya śaṃkara deveśa dīnānātha mahāprabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2383: kṛpāṃ kuru maheśānāparādhaṃ no kṣamasva vai // ŚivP_7.1,23.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2385: kṛpāṃ kuru maśānāparādhaṃ naḥ kṣamasva vai // ŚivP_7.1,23.46cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2387: duṣṭadaṇḍaprada svāminkṛpāṃ kuru namo 'stu te // ŚivP_7.1,23.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2388: tvaṃ prabho garvahartā vai duṣṭānāṃ tvāmajānatām // ŚivP_7.1,23.48ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2389: rakṣako hi viśeṣeṇa satāṃ tvatsaktacetasām // ŚivP_7.1,23.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2390: adbhutaṃ caritaṃ te hi niścitaṃ kṛpayā tava // ŚivP_7.1,23.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2393: iti stuto mahādevo brahmādyairamaraiḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2396: dadau narāṃśca suprītyā śaṃkaro dīnavatsalaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2397: sa ca tatastridaśāñcharaṇāgatān paramakāruṇikaḥ parameśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2401: śaraṇameva gatānavalokya vastadakhilaṃ kila vismṛtameva naḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2402: tadiha yūyamapi prakṛtaṃ manasyavigaṇayya vimardamapatrapāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.54ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2403: hariviriṃcisurendramukhāssukhaṃ vrajata devapuraṃ prati saṃprati // ŚivP_7.1,23.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2406: atha surā api te vigatavyathāḥ kathitabhadrasubhadraparākramāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2407: sapadi khena sukhena yathāsukhaṃ yayuranekamukhāḥ maghavanmukhāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2408: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe giriśānunayo nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:2411: antardhānagato devyā saha sānucaro haraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2412: kva yātaḥ kutra vāsaḥ kiṃ kṛtvā virarāma ha // ŚivP_7.1,24.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2416: tapo mahatkṛtaṃ tena voḍhuṃ svaśirasā śivau // ŚivP_7.1,24.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2424: ata eva hi devena devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2438: darpaṇe dehasaubhāgyaṃ draṣṭukāma iva sthitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2445: parītaḥ sarvato dikṣu bhramanniva vihāyasi // ŚivP_7.1,24.17ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2454: tatra tatra niṣaṇṇābhyāṃ śivābhyāṃ saphalīkṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2455: tamimaṃ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhaṃ smṛtvā sāmbastriyambakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2459: tathā gateṣu kāleṣu pravṛddhāsu prajāsu ca // ŚivP_7.1,24.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2461: tābhyāṃ tapo balāddattaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭinā // ŚivP_7.1,24.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2463: ayonijā tu yā kanyā hyaṃbikāṃśasamudbhavā // ŚivP_7.1,24.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2465: tayā tu nau vadhaḥ saṃkhye tasyāṃ kāmābhibhūtayoḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2466: iti cābhyarthito brahmā tābhyāmprāha tathāstviti // ŚivP_7.1,24.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2467: tataḥ prabhṛti śakrādīnvijitya samare surān // ŚivP_7.1,24.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2470: viniṃdyāpi rahasyaṃ vāṃ krodhayitvā yathā tathā // ŚivP_7.1,24.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2475: kālītyāha rahasyaṃ vāṃ nindayanniva sasmitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2476: tataḥ kruddhā tadā devī suvarṇā varṇakāraṇāt // ŚivP_7.1,24.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2479: īdṛśo mama varṇesminna ratirbhavato 'sti cet // ŚivP_7.1,24.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2480: evāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ kathameṣā niyamyate // ŚivP_7.1,24.33cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2481: aratyā vartamāno 'pi kathaṃ ca ramase mayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2484: iti hetoḥ smaro yasmātprasabhaṃ bhasmasātkṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2485: yā ca nābhimatā bharturapi sarvāṃgasundarī // ŚivP_7.1,24.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2486: sā vṛthaiva hi jāyeta sarvairapi guṇāntaraiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2487: bharturbhogaikaśeṣo hi sarga evaiṣa yoṣitām // ŚivP_7.1,24.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2489: tasmādvarṇamimaṃ tyaktvā tvayā rahasi ninditam // ŚivP_7.1,24.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2490: varṇāntaraṃ bhajiṣye vā na bhajiṣyāmi vā svayam // ŚivP_7.1,24.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2493: tathā praṇayabhaṃgena bhīto bhūtapatiḥ svayam // ŚivP_7.1,24.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2496: ajānatī ca krīḍoktiṃ priye kiṃ kupitāsi me // ŚivP_7.1,24.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2497: ratiḥ kuto vā jāyeta tvattaścedaratirmama // ŚivP_7.1,24.41cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2502: pṛthagjanānāṃ rataye kāmātmā kalpito mayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.44ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2504: māṃ vai tridaśasāmānyaṃ manyamāno manobhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2509: krodhasya janakaṃ vākyaṃ hṛdi kṛtvedamabravīt // ŚivP_7.1,24.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2511: śrutapūrvaṃ hi bhagavaṃstava cāṭu vaco mayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.48ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2513: prāṇānapyapriyā bharturnārī yā na parityajet // ŚivP_7.1,24.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2514: kulāṃganā śubhā sadbhiḥ kutsitaiva hi gamyate // ŚivP_7.1,24.49cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2515: bhūyasī ca tavāprītiragauramiti me vapuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2521: sa yadyevaṃvidhatāpaste tapasā kiṃ prayojanam // ŚivP_7.1,24.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2522: mamecchayā svecchayā vā varṇāntaravatī bhava // ŚivP_7.1,24.52cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2524: necchāmi bhavato varṇaṃ svayaṃ vā kartumanyathā // ŚivP_7.1,24.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2525: brahmāṇaṃ tapasārādhya kṣipraṃ gaurī bhavāmyaham // ŚivP_7.1,24.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2528: tamāhūya mahādevi tapasā kiṃ kariṣyasi // ŚivP_7.1,24.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2530: tvatto labdhapadā eva sarve brahmādayaḥ surāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2532: purā kila satī nāmnā dakṣasya duhitā 'bhavam // ŚivP_7.1,24.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2533: jagatāṃ patimevaṃ tvāṃ patiṃ prāptavatī tathā // ŚivP_7.1,24.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2534: evamadyāpi tapasā toṣayitvā dvijaṃ vidhim // ŚivP_7.1,24.57ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2535: gaurī bhavitumicchāmi ko doṣaḥ kathyatāmiha // ŚivP_7.1,24.57cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2538: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śivamandaragirinivāsakrīḍoktavarṇanaṃ nāma caturviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:2542: niyamya ca viyogārtiṃ jagāma himavadgirim // ŚivP_7.1,25.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2545: tataḥ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ ca tayorgṛhe // ŚivP_7.1,25.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2546: praṇamya vṛttaṃ vijñāpya tābhyāṃ cānumatā satī // ŚivP_7.1,25.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2547: punastapovanaṃ gatvā bhūṣaṇāni visṛjya ca // ŚivP_7.1,25.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2548: snātvā tapasvino veṣaṃ kṛtvā paramapāvanam // ŚivP_7.1,25.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2549: saṃkalpya ca mahātīvraṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram // ŚivP_7.1,25.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2551: tameva kṣaṇike liṃge dhyātvā bāhyavidhānataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2553: sa eva brahmaṇo mūrtimāsthāya tapasaḥ phalam // ŚivP_7.1,25.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2555: tathā tapaścarantīṃ tāṃ kāle bahutithe gate // ŚivP_7.1,25.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2559: taṃ dṛṣṭvāpi tathā vyāghraṃ duṣṭabhāvādupāgatam // ŚivP_7.1,25.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2562: mamāmiṣaṃ tato nānyaditi matvā nirantaram // ŚivP_7.1,25.11cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2567: trātā ca duṣṭasattvebhya iti pravavṛte kṛpā // ŚivP_7.1,25.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2569: babhūva sahasā vyāghro devīṃ ca bubudhe tadā // ŚivP_7.1,25.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2570: nyavartata bubhukṣā ca tasyāṃgastambhanaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.1,25.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2571: daurātmyaṃ janmasiddhaṃ ca tṛptiśca samajāyata // ŚivP_7.1,25.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2575: sa eva drāvako bhūtvā vicacāra tapovane // ŚivP_7.1,25.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2579: yathā ca dadatuḥ śumbhaniśumbhau varasammadāt // ŚivP_7.1,25.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2580: so 'pi śrutvā vidhirduḥkhaṃ surāṇāṃ kṛpayānvitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2582: sāmaraḥ prārthito brahmā yayau devyāstapovanam // ŚivP_7.1,25.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2584: dadarśa ca suraśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhe tapasi niṣṭhitām // ŚivP_7.1,25.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2586: nanāma cāsya jagato mātaraṃ svasya vai hareḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2588: brahmāṇamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā devī devagaṇaiḥ saha // ŚivP_7.1,25.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2590: tāṃ ca pratyupacāroktiṃ puraskṛtyābhinaṃdya ca // ŚivP_7.1,25.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2593: tīvreṇa tapasānena devyā kimiha sādhyate // ŚivP_7.1,25.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2594: tapaḥphalānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvadadhīnā hi siddhayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2595: yaścaiva jagatāṃ bhartā tameva parameśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,25.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2596: bhartāramātmanā prāpya prāptañca tapasaḥ phalam // ŚivP_7.1,25.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2598: idantu citraṃ devasya virahaṃ sahase katham // ŚivP_7.1,25.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2600: sargādau bhavato devādutpattiḥ śrūyate yadā // ŚivP_7.1,25.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2601: tadā prajānāṃ prathamastvaṃ me prathamajaḥ sutaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2602: yadā punaḥ prajāvṛddhyai lalāṭādbhavato bhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2603: utpanno 'bhūttadā tvaṃ me guruḥ śvaśurabhāvataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2604: yadā bhavadgirīndraste putro mama pitā svayam // ŚivP_7.1,25.31ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2605: tadā pitāmahastvaṃ me jāto lokapitāmaha // ŚivP_7.1,25.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2607: vṛttavantaḥpure bhartā kathayiṣye kathaṃ punaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2608: kimatra bahunā dehe yaścāyaṃ mama kālimā // ŚivP_7.1,25.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2612: etāvatā kimarthena tīvraṃ devi tapaḥ kṛtam // ŚivP_7.1,25.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2613: svecchaiva kimaparyāptā krīḍeyaṃ hi tavedṛśī // ŚivP_7.1,25.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2614: krīḍā 'pi ca jaganmātastava lokahitāya vai // ŚivP_7.1,25.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2615: ato mameṣṭamanayā phalaṃ kimapi sādhyatām // ŚivP_7.1,25.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2618: alaṃ vilaṃbanenātra tvaṃ kṣaṇena sthirā bhava // ŚivP_7.1,25.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2621: tvakkośaṃ sahasotsṛjya gaurī sā samajāyata // ŚivP_7.1,25.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2622: sā tvakkośātmanotsṛṣṭā kauśikī nāma nāmataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2624: sā tu māyātmikā śaktiryoganidrā ca vaiṣṇavī // ŚivP_7.1,25.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2626: saumyā ghorā ca miśrā ca trinetrā candraśekharā // ŚivP_7.1,25.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2628: dattā ca brahmaṇe devyā śaktireṣā sanātanī // ŚivP_7.1,25.42ab/

GP12sivap7_u:2988: suvarṇībhūtayā nyastaṃ merau śaravaṇe kvacit // ŚivP_7.1,30.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2989: saṃdīpayitvā kālena tasya bhāsā diśo daśa // ŚivP_7.1,30.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2991: tataścireṇa kālena saṃjāte tatra tejasi // ŚivP_7.1,30.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2993: tacchaiśavaṃ svarūpaṃ ca tasya dṛṣṭvā manoharam // ŚivP_7.1,30.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2999: svasya vakṣaḥsthale svairaṃ nartayitvā kumārakam // ŚivP_7.1,30.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3000: anubhūya ca tatkrīḍāṃ saṃbhāvya ca parasparam // ŚivP_7.1,30.40cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3003: svayandevaśca devī ca na tṛptimupajagmatuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3004: tataḥ śakreṇa saṃdhāya bibhyatā tārakāsurāt // ŚivP_7.1,30.42cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3022: śānta eva sadā sarvamanugṛhṇāti cecchivaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.51ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3023: sarvāṇi pūrayedeva kathaṃ śaktena mocayet // ŚivP_7.1,30.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3027: yathā hyāśu nivarteta tathā kathaya māruta // ŚivP_7.1,30.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3028: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śivatattvapraśno nāma triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3032: jijñāsā hi na nāstikyaṃ sādhayetsādhubuddhiṣu // ŚivP_7.1,31.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3034: asatāṃ tvanyathābhāvaḥ prasādena vinā prabhoḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3036: na kiṃcidapi kartavyamiti sādhu viniścitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3051: na hyasau niṣkalaḥ sākṣācchivaḥ paramakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3058: evaṃ śivo 'pi mūrtyātmanyanārūḍha iti sthitiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3061: ata eva hi pūjādau mūrtyātmaparikalpanam // ŚivP_7.1,31.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3062: mūrtyātmani kṛtaṃ sākṣācchiva eva kṛtaṃ yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3066: tathā mūrtyātmaniṣṭhena śivena paśavo vayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3069: ātmanāmeva bhogāya mokṣāya ca viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3072: na ca karma śivo 'stīti tasya bhogaḥ kimātmakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3073: sarvaṃ śivo 'nugṛhṇāti na nigṛhṇāti kiṃcana // ŚivP_7.1,31.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3074: nigṛhṇatāṃ tu ye doṣāśśive teṣāmasaṃbhavāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3077: brahmāṇḍasyādhipatyaṃ hi śrīkaṇṭhasya na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3079: sadoṣā eva devādyā nigṛhītā yathoditam // ŚivP_7.1,31.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3081: nigraho 'pi svarūpeṇa viduṣāṃ na jugupsitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3082: ata eva hi daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍo rājñāṃ praśasyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3084: na sa cedīśatāṃ kuryājjagataḥ kathamīśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3085: īśecchā ca vidhātṛtvaṃ vidherājñāpanaṃ param // ŚivP_7.1,31.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3088: viparītasamādhoḥ syānna sarvaṃ tattu dṛśyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3090: nivartate ca sāmāderaṃte daṇḍo hi sādhanam // ŚivP_7.1,31.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3094: sa kathaṃ duṣyate sadbhirasatāmeva nigrahāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3097: sarvo 'pi nigraho loke na ca vidveṣapūrvakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3098: na hi dveṣṭi pitā putraṃ yo nigṛhyāti śikṣayet // ŚivP_7.1,31.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3101: anyathā na hinastyeva sadoṣānapyasau parān // ŚivP_7.1,31.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3103: tasmādduḥkhātmikāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurvāṇo yaḥ sanirghṛṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3105: iti nirbaṃdhayaṃtyeke niyamo neti cāpare // ŚivP_7.1,31.37cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3106: nidānajñasya bhiṣajo rugṇo hiṃsāṃ prayuṃjataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3107: na kiṃcidapi nairghṛṇyaṃ ghṛṇaivātra prayojikā // ŚivP_7.1,31.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3108: ghṛṇāpi na guṇāyaiva hiṃsreṣu pratiyogiṣu // ŚivP_7.1,31.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3114: tasmād ghṛṇā guṇāyaiva sarvatheti na saṃmatam // ŚivP_7.1,31.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3116: mūrtyātmasvapi rāgādyā doṣāḥ santyeva vastutaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3117: tathāpi teṣāmevaite na śivasya tu sarvathā // ŚivP_7.1,31.43cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3118: agnāvapi samāviṣṭaṃ tāmraṃ khalu sakālikam // ŚivP_7.1,31.43ef/
GP12sivap7_u:3122: evaṃ śodhyātmasaṃsargānna hyaśuddhaḥ śivo bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,31.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3126: na hi kāṣṭhaṃ jvalatyūrdhvamagnireva jvalatyasau // ŚivP_7.1,31.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3131: tairguṇairuparaktānāṃ doṣāya ca guṇāya ca // ŚivP_7.1,31.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3133: na guṇāya na doṣāya śivasya guṇavṛttayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.50ef/
GP12sivap7_u:3135: saṃsāramocanaṃ kiṃ tu śaivamājñāmayaṃ hitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3140: hite sadā niyuktaṃ tu sarvaṃ cidacidātmakam // ŚivP_7.1,31.54ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3141: svabhāvapratibandhaṃ tatsamaṃ na labhate hitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3142: yathā vikāsayatyeva raviḥ padmāni bhānubhiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3144: svabhāvo 'pi hi bhāvānāṃ bhāvino 'rthasya kāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3145: na hi svabhāvo naśyantamarthaṃ kartṛṣu sādhayet // ŚivP_7.1,31.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3149: yadyathā bhavituṃ yogyaṃ tattathā na bhavetsvayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.58ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3150: vinā bhāvanayā kartā svatantrassantato bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,31.58cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3153: anyathā saṃsarantyete niyamānna śivaḥ katham // ŚivP_7.1,31.60ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3156: sa heturātmanāmeva nijo nāgantuko malaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.61cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3157: āgantukatve kasyāpi bhāvyaṃ kenāpi hetunā // ŚivP_7.1,31.62ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3159: ātmatāyāḥ samatve 'pi baddhā muktāḥ pare yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.63ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3163: mūrtyātmasu śivāḥ kecidadhvanāṃ mūrdhasu sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.65ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3170: śāntyatītapade śaivāḥ śānte māheśvare tataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.68cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3171: vidyāyāntu yathā raudrāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ tu vaiṣṇavāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.69ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3172: nivṛttau ca tathātmāno brahmā brahmāṃgayonayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.69cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3176: yathāmabhāvo muktasya pūrvaṃ paścāttu pakvatā // ŚivP_7.1,31.71cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3178: āme tvadharatā puṃsāṃ pakve tūttaratā kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.72cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3180: atrottarā ekamalā dvimalā madhyamā matāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.73cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3194: pṛthivīpada ityevaṃ devā devavrataiḥ stutā // ŚivP_7.1,31.79cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3197: asya rogasya bhaiṣajyaṃ jñānameva na cāparam // ŚivP_7.1,31.81ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3200: kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotīti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // ŚivP_7.1,31.82cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3201: duḥkhameva hi sarvo 'pi saṃsāra iti niścitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.83ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3203: na hi rogī hyarogī syādbhiṣagbhaiṣajyakāraṇāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.84ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3207: na bhiṣakkāraṇaṃ roge śivaḥ saṃsārakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.86ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3208: ityetadapi vaiṣamyaṃ na doṣāyāsya kalpate // ŚivP_7.1,31.86cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3210: svābhāviko malaḥ puṃsāṃ sa hi saṃsārayatyamūn // ŚivP_7.1,31.87cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3215: na nivartayituṃ śakyaṃ sānnidhyaṃ sadakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.90ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3217: na śivena vinā kiṃcitpravṛttamiha vidyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.91ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3218: tatpreritamidaṃ sarvaṃ tathāpi na sa muhyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.91cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3220: tayā tatamidaṃ śaśvattathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.92cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3221: anidaṃ prathamaṃ sarvamīśitavyaṃ sa īśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.93ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3222: īśanācca tadīyājñā tathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.93cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3223: yo 'nyathā manyate mohātsa vinaṣyati durmatiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.94ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3224: tacchaktivaibhavādeva tathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.94cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3228: munayo vismayāviṣṭāḥ preṇemuḥ pavanaṃ prabhum // ŚivP_7.1,31.96cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3237: nāparokṣādṛte mokṣa iti kṛtvā viniścayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.100ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3239: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe jñānopadeśo nāmaikatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3243: tattasya sādhanaṃ cādya vaktumarhasi māruta // ŚivP_7.1,32.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3245: śaivo hi paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3247: sa tu pañcavidho jñeyaḥ pañcabhiḥ parvabhiḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,32.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3249: taireva sottaraissiddho dharmastu paramo mataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3250: parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca jñānaṃ yatra ca mokṣadam // ŚivP_7.1,32.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3257: sa cāyaṃ paramo dharmaḥ paradharmasya sādhanam // ŚivP_7.1,32.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3259: śaivo yaḥ paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3263: śaivāgamo hi dvividhaḥ śrauto 'śrautaśca saṃskṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3265: svataṃtro daśadhā pūrvaṃ tathāṣṭādaśadhā punaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3268: paraṃ pāśupataṃ yatra vrataṃ jñānaṃ ca kathyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3273: te ca pāśupatā jñeyāssaṃhitānāṃ pravartakāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3276: teṣu pāśupato yogaḥ śivaṃ pratyakṣayeddṛḍham // ŚivP_7.1,32.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3278: tatrāpyupāyako yukto brahmaṇā sa tu kathyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3280: tena yogena sahasā śaivī prajñā prajāyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3283: prasīdati śivastasya yasya jñānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // ŚivP_7.1,32.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3284: prasādātparamo yogo yaḥ śivaṃ cāparokṣayet // ŚivP_7.1,32.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3286: tataḥ syānmuktasaṃsāro muktaḥ śivasamo bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,32.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3287: brahmaprokta ityupāyaḥ sa eva pṛthagucyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3288: śivo maheśvaraścaiva rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3294: padameva hi tannityamanityāḥ padinaḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3295: padānāṃ pratikṛttau tu mucyante padino yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3305: prakṛtestu paraṃ prāhuḥ puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśakam // ŚivP_7.1,32.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3308: tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ parassa maheśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3311: māyāntu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,32.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3313: kālātmā paramātmādiḥ sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3314: rudduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaheturvā tadrāvayati naḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3315: rudra ityucyate sadbhiḥ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,32.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3320: nidānajño yathā vaidyo rogasya vinivartakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3326: aṇavo naiva jānanti māyayaiva malāvṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3338: chittvā paryaṣṭakākāraṃ svātmānaṃ ca suṣumṇayā // ŚivP_7.1,32.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3347: dhyātvā hi mānase devaṃ svasthacitto 'tha mānavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3349: abhyarcanānte tu punaḥ prāṇānāyamya mānavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3350: samyakcittaṃ samādhāya śārvaṃ nāmāṣṭakaṃ japet // ŚivP_7.1,32.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3354: evaṃ kṛtvā cirādeva jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ śubham // ŚivP_7.1,32.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3355: labhate tatpratiṣṭhāṃ ca vṛttaṃ cānuttamaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.1,32.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3356: yogaṃ ca paramaṃ labdhvā mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3357: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3361: brahmādayo 'pi yatkṛtvā sarve pāśupatāḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3367: tatra pūrvaṃ trayodaśyāṃ susnātaḥ sukṛtāhnikaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3368: anujñāpya svamācāryaṃ saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca // ŚivP_7.1,33.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3369: pūjāṃ vaiśeṣikīṃ kṛtvā śuklāṃbaradharaḥ svayam // ŚivP_7.1,33.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3371: darbhāsane samāsīno darbhamuṣṭiṃ pragṛhya ca // ŚivP_7.1,33.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3374: dhyātvā devaṃ ca devīṃ ca tadvijñāpanavartmanā // ŚivP_7.1,33.6ef/
GP12sivap7_u:3377: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā māsadvādaśakaṃ tu vā // ŚivP_7.1,33.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3378: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā māsamekamathāpi vā // ŚivP_7.1,33.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3382: hutvājyena samidbhiśca caruṇā ca yathākramam // ŚivP_7.1,33.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3390: rāgo vidyākale caiva niyatiḥ kāla eva ca // ŚivP_7.1,33.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3391: māyā ca śuddhividyā ca maheśvarasadāśivau // ŚivP_7.1,33.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3392: śaktiśca śivatattvaṃ ca tattvāni kramaśo viduḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3393: mantraistu virajairhutvā hotāsau virajā bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,33.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3396: vinyasyāgnau ca samprokṣya dine tasminhaviṣyabhuk // ŚivP_7.1,33.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3397: prabhāte tu caturdaśyāṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ puroditam // ŚivP_7.1,33.18ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3398: dine tasminnirāhāraḥ kālaṃ śeṣaṃ samāpayet // ŚivP_7.1,33.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3399: prātaḥ parvaṇi cāpyevaṃ kṛtvā homā vasānataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.19ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3401: tataśca jaṭilo muṇḍī śikhaikajaṭa eva vā // ŚivP_7.1,33.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3404: ekāmbaro valkalī vā bhaveddaṇḍī ca mekhalī // ŚivP_7.1,33.21cd/

GP12sivap7_u:4912: vrataṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ bhūśayyānaktabhojanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.21cd/

GP12sivap7_u:4919: tathaiva vānaprasthānāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ ca sundari // ŚivP_7.2,11.25ab/

GP12sivap7_u:4952: āyuḥ śriyaṃ kulaṃ śīlaṃ hitvā nirayamāvahet // ŚivP_7.2,11.40cd/

GP12sivap7_u:4958: mayi cittasamāsaṃgo yena kenāpi hetunā // ŚivP_7.2,11.43cd/

GP12sivap7_u:4966: guroradhikṛtaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ pāśaḥ paśuḥ patiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.47ab/

GP12sivap7_u:4978: naikāgraṃ cecchive cittaṃ kiṃ kṛtenāpi karmaṇā // ŚivP_7.2,11.53ab/

GP12sivap7_u:4982: yena kenāpyupāyena śive cittaṃ niveśayet // ŚivP_7.2,11.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4984: paratreha ca sarvatra nirvṛtiḥ paramā bhavet // ŚivP_7.2,11.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4987: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṃḍe śivajñānavarṇanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12sivap7_u:5006: omityekākṣare mantre sthitaḥ sarvagataḥ śivaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5009: maṃtre ṣaḍakṣare sūkṣme pañcabrahmatanuḥ śivaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.9ef/

GP12sivap7_u:5022: na sarvajñaṃ vinā puṃsāmādisargaḥ prasiddhyati // ŚivP_7.2,12.16ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5039: te ceśvare na vidyete brūyātsa kathamanyathā // ŚivP_7.2,12.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5041: praṇītamamalaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.24ef/
GP12sivap7_u:5048: saṃskṛtenāpi kiṃ tena mṛdunā lalitena vā // ŚivP_7.2,12.28ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5052: bahutvepi hi maṃtrāṇāṃ sarvajñena śivena yaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5053: praṇīto vimalo mantro na tena sadṛśaḥ kvacit // ŚivP_7.2,12.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5057: mantraḥ ṣaḍakṣaro bhinnassūtraṃ vṛtyātmanā yathā // ŚivP_7.2,12.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5058: śivajñānāni yāvaṃti vidyāsthānāpi yāni ca // ŚivP_7.2,12.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5059: ṣaḍakṣarasya sūtrasya tāni bhāṣyaṃ samāsataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.33cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5068: ityuktaṃ parameśena devyā pṛṣṭena śūlinā // ŚivP_7.2,12.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5069: hitāya sarvamartyānāṃ dvijānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5070: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe pañcākṣaramāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:5073: kalau kaluṣite kāle durjaye duratikrame // ŚivP_7.2,13.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5076: sarvādhikāre saṃdigdhe niścite vāpi paryaye // ŚivP_7.2,13.2cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5081: bhaktyā ca bhāvitātmāno mucyaṃte kalijā narāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.4cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5090: karmāyogena yatkarma kṛtaṃ ca narakāya hi // ŚivP_7.2,13.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5091: tataḥ kathaṃ vimucyeta patito vidyayā 'nayā // ŚivP_7.2,13.8ef/

GP12sivap7_u:5095: samaṃtrakaṃ māṃ patitaḥ pūjayedyadi mohitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5096: nārakī syānna sandeho mama pañcākṣaraṃ vinā // ŚivP_7.2,13.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5097: abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāśca ye cānye vratakarśitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5099: bhaktyā pañcākṣareṇaiva yo hi māṃ sakṛdarcayet // ŚivP_7.2,13.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5100: so 'pi gacchenmama sthānaṃ mantrasyāsyaiva gauravāt // ŚivP_7.2,13.12cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5105: arudro vā sarudro vā sakṛtpañcākṣareṇa yaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.15ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5110: mama bhakto jitakrodho salabdho 'labdha eva vā // ŚivP_7.2,13.17cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5117: mama pañcākṣare maṃtre tasmācchreṣṭhataro hi saḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5119: tiṣṭhaṃti śāśvatā dharmā devāssarvamidaṃ jagat // ŚivP_7.2,13.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5122: eko 'haṃ saṃsthito devi na dvitīyo 'sti kutracit // ŚivP_7.2,13.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5123: tadā vedāśca śāstrāṇi sarve pañcākṣare sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.23cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5124: te nāśaṃ naiva saṃprāptā macchaktyā hyanupālitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5127: tadā nārāyaṇaśśete devo māyāmayīṃ tanum // ŚivP_7.2,13.25cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5133: matputrāṇāṃ mahādeva śaktiṃ dehi maheśvara // ŚivP_7.2,13.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5138: jñātvā prayogaṃ vividhaṃ siddhamaṃtraḥ prajāpatiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.31ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5139: putrebhyaḥ pradadau maṃtraṃ maṃtrārthaṃ ca yathātatham // ŚivP_7.2,13.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5140: te ca labdhvā maṃtraratnaṃ sākṣāllokapitāmahāt // ŚivP_7.2,13.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5142: merostu śikhare ramye muṃjavānnāma parvataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.33ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5147: ṛṣiṃ chaṃdaśca kīlaṃ ca bījaśaktiṃ ca daivatam // ŚivP_7.2,13.35cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5156: prathamaṃ manmukhodgīrṇā sā mamaivāsti vācikā // ŚivP_7.2,13.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5164: pītaḥ kṛṣṇastathā dhūmraḥ svarṇābho rakta eva ca // ŚivP_7.2,13.43cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5167: bījaṃ dvitīyaṃ bījeṣu maṃtrasyāsya varānane // ŚivP_7.2,13.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5169: vāmadevo nāma ṛṣiḥ paṃktiśchanda udāhṛtam // ŚivP_7.2,13.46ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5170: devatā śiva evāhaṃ mantrasyāsya varānane // ŚivP_7.2,13.46cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5173: gāyatryanuṣṭup triṣṭup ca chaṃdāṃsi bṛhatī virāṭ // ŚivP_7.2,13.48ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5174: indro rudro harirbrahmā skaṃdasteṣāṃ ca devatāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5175: mama pañcamukhānyāhuḥ sthāne teṣāṃ varānane // ŚivP_7.2,13.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5178: pañcamaḥ svaritaścaiva tṛtīyo nihataḥ smṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.50cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5180: nāmānyasya vijānīyācchaivaṃ me hṛdayaṃ mahat // ŚivP_7.2,13.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5184: phaḍityapi ca varṇānāmante 'ṅgatvaṃ yadā tadā // ŚivP_7.2,13.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5191: yadā kadāpi vā bhaktyā yatra kutrāpi vā kṛtā // ŚivP_7.2,13.57ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5192: yena kenāpi vā devi pūjā muktiṃ nayiṣyate // ŚivP_7.2,13.57cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5193: mayyāsaktena manasā yatkṛtaṃ mama sundari // ŚivP_7.2,13.58ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5194: matpriyaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva krameṇāpyakrameṇa vā // ŚivP_7.2,13.58cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5195: tathāpi mama bhaktā ye nātyaṃtavivaśāḥ punaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.59ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5196: teṣāṃ sarveṣu śāstreṣu mayeva niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.59cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5199: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe pañcākṣaramāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12sivap7_u:5210: vācā ca manasā caiva kāyena draviṇena ca // ŚivP_7.2,14.4cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5213: bhūṣaṇāni ca vāsāṃsi dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca // ŚivP_7.2,14.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5214: etāni gurave dadyādbhaktyā ca vibhave sati // ŚivP_7.2,14.6cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5226: śucau deśe gṛhe vāpi kāle siddhikare tithau // ŚivP_7.2,14.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5228: anugṛhya tato dadyājjñānaṃ mama yathāvidhi // ŚivP_7.2,14.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5231: śivaṃ cāstu śubhaṃ cāstu śobhano 'stu priyo 'stviti // ŚivP_7.2,14.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5232: evaṃ dadyādgururmaṃtramājñāṃ caiva tataḥ param // ŚivP_7.2,14.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5233: evaṃ labdhvā gurormaṃtramājñāṃ caiva samāhitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,14.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5236: ananyastatparo bhūtvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // ŚivP_7.2,14.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5238: naktāśī saṃyamī yassa pauraścaraṇikaḥ smṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,14.18cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5240: tasya nāsti samo loke sa siddhaḥ siddhado bhavet // ŚivP_7.2,14.19cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5242: tvayā māṃ hṛdi saṃciṃtya saṃciṃtya svaguruṃ tataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,14.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5243: udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā maunī caikāgramānasaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,14.21ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5394: jñānena kriyayā vātha guruśśiṣyaṃ viśodhayet // ŚivP_7.2,15.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5395: yo 'nyathā kurute mohātsa vinaśyati durmatiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,15.15ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5529: aṣṭadikṣu tathā dikṣu tatraiśānyāṃ punaḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,16.3cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5544: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi tāmrajaṃ mṛnmayaṃ tu vā // ŚivP_7.2,16.11ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5549: vinā sūtrādikaṃ sarvaṃ padmapatramathāpi vā // ŚivP_7.2,16.13cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5588: dukūlārdhena vastreṇa maṃtritena navena ca // ŚivP_7.2,16.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5595: sa dṛṣṭvā maṃḍalaṃ bhūyaḥ praṇametsāñjaliḥ prabhum // ŚivP_7.2,16.36ab/

GP12sivap7_u:6730: raṃ vahnayeti svāheti madhye hutvāhutitrayam // ŚivP_7.2,27.26ab/

GP12sivap7_u:6743: daśaivāhutayastatra pañca vā tritayaṃ ca vā // ŚivP_7.2,27.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6746: tatra divyena hotavyaṃ tīrthenārṣeṇa vā tathā // ŚivP_7.2,27.33cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6750: tato homaviśiṣṭena ghṛtenāpūrya vai srucam // ŚivP_7.2,27.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6751: nidhāya puṣpaṃ tasyāgre śruveṇādhomukhena tām // ŚivP_7.2,27.35cd/

GP12sivap7_u:6795: ādāya vā samāloḍya bhasmādhāre vinikṣipet // ŚivP_7.2,27.57ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6796: taijasaṃ dāravaṃ vāpi mṛnmayaṃ śailameva ca // ŚivP_7.2,27.57cd/

GP12sivap7_u:6798: same deśe śubhe śuddhe dhanavadbhasma nikṣipet // ŚivP_7.2,27.58cd/

GP12sivap7_u:6807: atha vidyāsanaṃ nyasya supralipte tu maṇdale // ŚivP_7.2,27.63ab/

GP12sivap7_u:6941: skande śivātmako dharmo nāle jñānaṃ śivāśrayam // ŚivP_7.2,29.17ab/

GP12sivap7_u:7007: trimūrtiṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pūjayedagnidigdale // ŚivP_7.2,30.8cd/

GP12sivap7_u:7012: aṣṭasu kramaśo dikṣu pūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7014: ugro bhīmo mahādeva ityaṣṭau mūrtayaḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7018: mahādevaḥ śivo rudraḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.13ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7019: īśāno vijayo bhīmo devadevo bhavodbhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.13cd/

GP12sivap7_u:7024: tasminnāvaraṇe bhūyo vṛṣendraṃ purato yajet // ŚivP_7.2,30.16ab/

GP12sivap7_u:7046: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7047: amoghā vidyutā caiva pūrvādi paritaḥ sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7051: arko brahmā tathā rudro viṣṇuścaite vivasvataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7052: vistārā pūrvadigbhāge sutarāṃ dakṣiṇe sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7053: bodhanī paścime bhāge āpyāyinyuttare punaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7054: uṣāṃ prabhāṃ tathā prājñāṃ sandhyāmapi tataḥ param // ŚivP_7.2,30.31ab/

GP12sivap7_u:7057: bṛhaspatiṃ bṛhadbuddhiṃ bhārgavaṃ tejasāṃ nidhim // ŚivP_7.2,30.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7058: śanaiścaraṃ tathā rāhuṃ ketuṃ dhūmraṃ bhayaṃkaram // ŚivP_7.2,30.33ab/

GP12sivap7_u:7070: kālaṃ paścimadigbhāge puruṣaṃ cottare yajet // ŚivP_7.2,30.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7074: catvāra ete kramaśaḥ prathamāvaraṇe sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.40cd/

GP12sivap7_u:7083: prasūtiśca tathā ' 'kūtiḥ khyātiḥ sambhūtireva ca // ŚivP_7.2,30.45ab/

GP12sivap7_u:7085: devamātārundhatī ca sarvāḥ khalu pativratāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.46ab/
